sections.heading: Directors; duties; plans; apportionment of benefits; area method of allocation, authorized
sections.text: The board of directors having adopted the plans of public works and apportionment of benefits method of financing, shall apportion the benefits thereof accruing to the several tracts of land within the distric

sections.heading: constitutional, though it does not require notice before adopting plan of drainage, or that apportionment precede construction of improvements, etc
as constitutional against claim of taking property without due process of law. State ex rel. Harris v. Hanson, 80 Neb. 738, 117 N.W. 412 (1908).
sections.text: as constitutional against claim of taking property without due process of law. State ex rel. Harris v. Hanson, 80 Neb. 738, 117 N.W. 412 (1908).
